title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
languages: English,French,Italian,German,Spanish - Spain,Russian,Czech,Japanese,Korean,Polish,Portuguese - Brazil,Simplified Chinese,Spanish - Latin America,Traditional Chinese,Turkish,Ukrainian,Thai
features: Single-player,Online PvP,Online Co-op,Steam Achievements,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Cloud,Family Sharing
description: Embody the superhuman skill and brutality of a Space Marine. Unleash deadly abilities and devastating weaponry to obliterate the relentless Tyranid swarms. Defend the Imperium in spectacular third-person action in solo or multiplayer modes.
